title: LA-20-04: Increased Gifts and Travel Reimbursements Reporting Thresholds for Financial Disclosure Reports and Nonsponsor Widely Attended Gatherings Gift Exception Ceiling
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/43795F3BAF869CE3852585BB005DA325/$FILE/LA-20-04 Increased Gifts and Travel Reimbursements Thresholds and WAG Exception Ceiling.pdf?open
summary: This Legal Advisory discusses the recent amendments to the gifts and travel reimbursements reporting thresholds at 5 C.F.R. §§ 2634.304 and 2634.907(g) and the widely attended gathering (WAG) gift exception ceiling for nonsponsor gifts of free attendance at 5 C.F.R. § 2635.204(g)(3).
